description:
A fully integrated intelligent cloud-based unified communications (UC) solution

NEC UNIVERGE BLUE CONNECT is a fully integrated intelligent cloud-based unified communications platform for any size business. NEC believes that tools facilitate communications, but people are the center of all communications and with effective communication tools people can be more productive and connected. These communications tools should be easy-to-use, high-performing, dependable, and stress-free so that you can focus on what is being communicated and not the tool itself.
UNIVERGE BLUE CONNECT combines your phone system, chat, video, screen sharing, file management, and conference calling into a seamless experience that fits with your business size, needs, and work style. Get customizable, scalable cloud-based services for your business backed by NEC’s five pillars of a Stress-Free Cloud Experience.
UNIVERGE BLUE incorporates all your business communication and collaboration methods and devices into one integrated, intelligent, easy-to-manage cloud-based system that is accessible from anywhere at any time.
